stepBody: Alex wants to ensure that all entries in a column of a spreadsheet are formatted as dates. What feature can he use to automatically check and enforce this format?
choices: He can use the Data Validation feature to set a rule that only allows date entries in the column.
He can use Conditional Formatting to highlight cells that are not formatted as dates.
He can use the Find and Replace feature to manually change $$non-date$$ entries to dates.
He can use the Sort feature to organize the column by date.
